short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extra features for "Wbijam" anime website that enhance user experience and reduce unnecessary actions that cause distraction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
- enable possibility to navigate to the next episode from player view
- use same player upon next episode navigation¹
- pick first available player if the one from previous episode is not available²


¹ Same player - enabled by default; can be disabled in context menu (right click))
² First available player - enabled by default; works only if the above option is enabled; can be disabled in context menu (right click))
